cards.name: Smalljon Umber
cards.text:
Renown.
Smalljon Umber gets -1 STR for each plot card in your used pile.
cards.flavor: ... still called the Smalljon though he threatened to overtop his father.

cards.name: No Surprises
cards.text: Action: Reveal your hand (of at least 1 card). Then, until the end of the phase, each opponent cannot play events or bring cards out of shadows.

cards.name: Arrogant Contender
cards.text: While Arrogant Contender is participating in a challenge, it gets +1 STR for each participating character an opponent controls. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Arrogant Contender is attacking alone, it gains 1 power for each defending character (to a maximum of 3 power).
cards.designer: Card design by 2010 Melee World Champion, Brett Zeiler.

cards.name: Show of Strength
cards.text: Challenges Action: Until the end of the phase, treat each character with STR 3 or lower as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).

cards.name: Owen the Oaf
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. While Owen the Oaf is participating in a challenge, each character with more than 1 challenge icon does not contribute its STR to the challenge.
cards.flavor: When Owen the Oaf began to dance with Patchface the fool, laughter echoed off the vaulted ceiling.

cards.name: Shadow of the Wall
cards.text: Shadow (0). Action: Choose and stand a character with 1 or fewer challenge icons. If there is a Winter plot card revealed, return Shadow of the Wall to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile.

cards.name: Red Keep Gaoler
cards.text: Shadow (4). Action: Move 2 power from your faction card to a [baratheon] character to put Red Keep Gaoler into play from shadows.

cards.name: The Black Cells
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After a card you control comes out of shadows, kneel The Black Cells to choose an opponent's character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot kneel or stand.

cards.name: The Regent's Guard
cards.text: Shadow (4). Action: Return a [lannister] non-Ally character with printed cost 4 or higher to your hand to put The Regent's Guard into play from shadows.

cards.name: Pyromancer's Cache
cards.text: Location only. Treat attached location as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits). Attached location gains: "Action: Kneel this location to draw 1 card."

cards.name: Alannys Greyjoy
cards.text: Reaction: After a [greyjoy] location enters play under your control, draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)
cards.flavor: Even now, it was hard to credit that frail, sickly Lady Alannys had outlived her husband Lord Balon, who had seemed so hard and strong.

cards.name: Nightflyer
cards.text: Shadow (X). Reaction: After Nightflyer comes out of shadows, choose a location with printed cost X or lower and discard it from play. +1 Initiative.

cards.name: Black Market Merchant
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reaction: After Black Market Merchant comes out of shadows, search the top 10 cards of your deck for an attachment with printed cost 3 or lower and attach it to an eligible character you control. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Shadow of the East
cards.text: Shadow (0). Action: Choose an attachment and discard it from play. If there is a Summer plot card revealed, return Shadow of the East to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile.

cards.name: The Fowler Twins
cards.text: Action: Choose a character. That character must be declared as an attacker or defender in the next challenge initiated this phase, if able. (Limit once per phase.)
cards.flavor: "...Nym is too close to the Fowler twins. And who might the Fowler twins confide in? I could not take the risk." <cite>Doran Martell</cite>

cards.name: Shadow of the South
cards.text: Shadow (1). Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice. If there is a Scheme plot card revealed, return Shadow of the South to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile.

cards.name: Ghost of High Heart
cards.text: While you control no loyal characters, each character you control gets +1 STR. Challenges Action: Kneel Ghost of High Heart to look at a player's hand. Choose and discard 1 card from that hand. Then, that player draws 1 card.
cards.designer: Card design by 2006 World Champion, Matthew Ley.

cards.name: Shadow Politics
cards.text: Shadow (1). Action: Choose one: - Choose and discard 1 card from shadows. - Choose up to 5 cards in a single discard pile and remove them from the game. - Look at an opponent's hand.

cards.name: Knights of the Hollow Hill
cards.text:
You cannot place cards during setup. Your other cards do not provide a gold bonus.
+3 Income. +2 Initiative. +1 Reserve.
cards.designer: Card design by 2009 Joust World Champion, Greg Atkinson.

cards.name: A City Besieged
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose and kneel a location. (Up to 2 locations instead if there is a City plot card in your used pile.)
